fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
All main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files pertaining to research, development and innovation in the field of software and services. 
NESSI interacts most closely with EC DG CNECT.  Our formal point of contact is Unit E.2, and in addition we liaise with other Units from time to time, regarding the European research and innovation agenda. NESSI closely follows the discussions related to the Multi Financial Framework regarding research and innovation.
organisation_name: Networked European Software and Services Initiative (NESSI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: A European Technology Platform, recognised by the EC in Horizon 2020, to promote research, development and innovation in the field of software and services.
